name: Dreamworld (itch)
description:
A game by Felix Knight, Alice Kalok, and Vincent Nguyen.

Created for our senior capstone project for Loudoun Valley High School, a simple (for you, not us) game about finding a planet to explore out in big, vast, dark space.

Also check out our (simple) website- dreamworldcapstone.weebly.com

Credits also to: -Anton Revin: Xbox One Controller Graphic at https://opengameart.org/content/xbox-one- controller-pixel-art -“Immersed” Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By  Attribution 3.0 License http://creativecommons.org/lic...
